definitions.text: a deep pulsating type of pain
an instance of rapid strong pulsation (of the heart)
examples: he felt a throbbing in his head

definitions.text: pulsate or pound with abnormal force
expand and contract rhythmically; beat rhythmically
examples: The baby's heart was pulsating again after the surgeon massaged it

definitions.text: tremble convulsively, as from fear or excitement
